endpoints.description: Retrieve a current snapshot of the inventory levels categorized by material type.
Submit performance feedback for a specific supplier based on recent transactions.
Obtain recommended logistics routes based on current transportation data and constraints.
Upload intended reordering schedules for materials to align with predictive demand planning.
Access a list of available raw material sources with quality and cost evaluations.
Submit and manage data related to in-transit shipments for improved monitoring.
Analyze trends and receive predictive insights on inventory levels based on historical data.
Perform cost breakdown studies concerning procurement and logistics expenditures.
Retrieve a comprehensive status report of the supply chain's operational efficiency.
Input considerations and retrieve optimization recommendations tailored for supply chain strategies.
